title: Covid Vaccine Resisters Seek Religious Exemptions. But What Counts?
content:
1. Covid Vaccine Resisters Seek Religious Exemptions. But What Counts?  The New York Times
  2. Not getting vaccinated against Covid-19 is like driving while intoxicated, one health expert says  CNN
  3. What constitutes a "sincerely held" religious exemption to a vaccine mandate?  CBS News
  4. Data Backs Up Use of Covid Vaccine Mandates: Johns Hopkins  Bloomberg Markets and Finance
  5. Henry Ford Health System workers drop COVID-19 vaccine mandate lawsuit  Detroit Free Press
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
